chapter1.hint: Welcome newcomer! If you entered this cave I'm assuming you want to become a scientist!
Your journey will not be an easy one as many obstacles stand in your way.
But I believe you cn do it! Go through the portals to enter a minigame that teaches you about an aspect of the queing theory!
Make sure you get through all of them as they all contain vital information!
At the end you will use your newfound skills to battle a big boss!
Now go forth and learn! (Oh! by the way, if you didn't already know W is to jump, A is to go left, and D is to go right!)
